title.native: 日本へようこそエルフさん。

description:
Ms. Elf is intrigued by Japanese culture?!

Working adult Kitase Kazuhiro’s hobby is sleeping. Ever since he was a child, he’s had exciting adventures in the mysterious other world he dreams about. One day, while exploring ancient ruins with an elf girl he befriended, he is unfortunately burned by the breath of a magic dragon he encounters.

When he awakens from his dream, an elf girl who shouldn’t be in his room is sleeping next to him…

(Source: Crunchyroll)
hashtag: #日本へようこそエルフさん

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Language Barrier
tags.description: A barrier to communication between people who are unable to speak a common language.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

title.native: 日本へようこそエルフさん。
日本へようこそエルフさん。
カズヒホとマリーのようこそキッチン。

node.description:
[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsg-YqdqQ-KFF0LNk23BY4A) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HiguchiKaede)

Higuchi Kaede (樋口楓) is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber and a member of NIJISANJI's first generation along with Tsukino Mito, Elu, Yuki Chihiro, Shizuka Rin, Shibuya Hajime, Suzuya Aki, and Moira. Within the first generation, she forms the unit "JK gumi" (JK組, high school girl group) along with Tsukino Mito and Shizuka Rin.

__Residence:__ Sendai, Miyagi, Japan

[Website](http://sasakirico.com/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ricomotion1/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sasakirico)

Rico Sasaki is a voice actor and singer. She is the vocalist and lead guitarist of the band [Ave Mujica](https://anilist.co/staff/353935/Ave-Mujica).
